science.title: Learning outcome
science.content: Scientific discovery is a formal method of gaining new scientific knowledge. By understanding every step in the process, you gain a solid starting point for learning anything new.

science.title: Learning outcome
science.content: Making observations and transferring information from your senses to another medium is both a concept and a skill. With these slides, I showcase my ability to create structured notes and compile my work in one place on the web.

science.title: Learning outcome
science.content: Being able to create new connections from exploration and observation. It is gaining an understanding of the iterative scientific method.

science.title: Learning outcome
science.content: An understanding of the concept of different perspectives in science. Examples may vary, as shown in the slide.

science.title: Learning outcome
science.content: Two examples of why perspectives are important in science.

science.content: Understand the moving parts involved in all fields of science.

science.title: Learning outcome
science.content: Gain insight into science history and learn about the roots of modern biology.

science.content: Understand the difference between naturalists and scientists.

science.title: Learning outcome
science.content: Understand the pros and cons of sampling methods.

science.title: Learning outcome
science.content: Understand how to find quality resources for research, proper citing, and data interpretation.
